title: The Ghost in the Machine
itunes:title: The Ghost in the Machine
description:
What does "the ghost in the machine" mean? From philosophy to artificial intelligence, we explore this idiom to understand what it means, how it's used and if the dream of strong AI is realistic.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
What does "the ghost in the machine" mean? From philosophy to artificial intelligence, we explore this idiom to understand what it means, how it's used and if the dream of strong AI is realistic.

itunes:keywords: artificial intelligence, AI, strong AI, ghost in the machine, philosophy, Descartes, Turing, Turing Test, Imitation Game, Chinese room, Searle, consciousness, sentience, Google, Waymo, Uber, Levandowski, Way of the Future, church, religion, deus ex machina
